original_text: Without weakening in his faith, he faced the fact that his body was as good as dead—since he was about a hundred years old—and that Sarah’s womb was also dead.
korean_text: 그가 백 세나 되어 자기 몸이 죽은 것 같고 사라의 태가 죽은 것 같음을 알고도 믿음이 약하여지지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: that his body was as good as dead
since he was about a hundred years old
and that Sarah's womb was also dead
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사라의 자궁도 죽은 상태였다는 것
